entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 1:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: S 28 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
